InstitutionalDepartmentName: Department of Medical Physics and Acoustics
Instructions: Your task is to listen to the audiobook carefully. At the end of the audiobook, you will be asked three questions about its content. During the measurement, try to keep your eyes as still as possible and focus on the cross.
TaskDescription: Participants listened to 60 brief frequency sweeps (chirps) presented at 60 dB SPL, followed by a 10-minute audiobook excerpt played at 65 dB SPL. Stimuli were presented via insert earphones. After the auditory stimulation, participants answered comprehension questions related to the audiobook content. Note: Participant sub-02 received 150 chirps instead of 60.
